components.name: CodeComponent

inputsClass.name: path
inputsClass.description: Path or name of the file that you want to display.

styleUrlsData.data:
\:host
  position: relative
  display: block
  overflow: auto

pre
  margin: 0
  padding: 0
  height: 100%
  overflow: auto
  
  code
    margin: 0

.source-actions
  position: absolute
  right: 0
  top: 0
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column
  align-items: flex-end
  padding: 5px 15px

components.name: CodeLineComponent

styleUrlsData.data:
\:host
  display: block
  margin: 5px 0
  position: relative

docs-copy-button
  position: absolute
  right: 15px
  top: 50%
  transform: translateY(-50%)

.code-container
  display: flex
  flex-direction: row
  background: whitesmoke
  align-items: center

pre
  flex: 1 1
  background: transparent
  margin: 0

code
  margin: 0

components.name: ComponentApiComponent
components.description: Displays the component API: inputs, outputs and methods.
components.rawdescription: Displays the component API: inputs, outputs and methods.

styleUrlsData.data:
@import '../../styles/variables'

table
    border-collapse: collapse
    border: 1px solid $color-light-grey
    border-radius: 1px
    width: 100%

thead
    background: $color-light-grey

th
    text-align: left

th, td
    padding: 3px 20px 3px 3px

tr
    border-bottom: 1px solid $color-light-grey

.name, .type
    width: 30%

.description
    width: 40%

components.templateData:
Selector: {{selector$ | async}}

Inputs

Input Type Description
{{input.name}} {{getInputType(input) | async}}

Outputs

Output Type Description
{{output.name}} {{output.defaultValue}}

Methods

Method Description
{{output.name}}

components.name: ComponentDescriptionComponent
ComponentDocumentationComponent
components.description: Component that displays a component's or a directive's information: an overview, examples and API.
components.rawdescription: Component that displays a component's or a directive's information: an overview, examples and API.

styleUrlsData.data:
@import '../../styles/variables'

\:host
  height: 100%
  overflow: hidden
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column

.header
  flex: 0 0 auto
  display: flex
  flex-direction: row
  align-items: center
  border-bottom: 1px solid grey
  box-shadow: 2px 0px 2px 1px lightgrey
  padding: 0 15px

.content
  flex: 1 1
  padding: 15px
  overflow: auto


h2
  margin-top: 50px
  border-bottom: 1px solid $color-light-grey

ol
  list-style: none
  margin: 0 0 0 30px
  padding: 0

li
  display: inline-block
  margin: 0
  padding: 5px 10px
  transition: color 0.2s
  cursor: pointer

  &:hover
    color: $color-three

  &.active
    color: $color-four

components.templateData:
{{componentTitle}}

  1. Overview
  2. Examples
  3. API

Examples

API

components.name: ComponentExampleComponent
CopyButtonComponent

styleUrlsData.data:
\:host
  display: block

button
  border: none
  box-shadow: none
  background: transparent
  height: auto
  line-height: normal
  color: grey
  outline: none
  padding: 0

  &:hover
    color: black

components.name: DefaultWelcomeComponent
components.templateData:
Default Welcome Page

Documentation & Demo

This documentation is a combination of automated comment extraction from your code and of component examples.

Navigation

Use the menu on the left to navigate throught components.

Backed by Interfacewerk

Interfacewerk is a digital innovation consultancy focussing on Software Design and User Experience.

components.name: DocsComponent

styleUrlsData.data:
@import '../styles/_variables'

docs-app
  display: block
  position: relative
  width: 100vw
  height: 100vh

  $width_aside: 200px

  a.brand-header
    width: calc(100% - 30px)
    display: block
    margin: 0 15px
    &, &:hover, &:focus
      text-decoration: none
    
  aside
    position: absolute
    top: 0
    left: 0
    height: 100%
    width: $width_aside
    overflow: auto
    background: white
    color: black
    padding: 15px 0px
    border-right: 1px solid grey
    box-shadow: 2px 0px 2px 1px lightgray

  main
    position: absolute
    top: 0
    left: $width_aside
    height: 100%
    right: 0
    overflow: auto

  ul
    padding: 0
    margin: 0

    li
      list-style: none
      width: 100%
      padding: 0

      a
        display: inline-block
        width: 100%
        line-height: 20px
        text-decoration: none
        padding: 10px 15px
        color: black
        font-size: 1.6rem
        transition: all 0.2s

        &:hover
          color: $color-three
          background: whitesmoke

        &.active-link
          color: $color-four
          background: whitesmoke
  
  .extra-links li:first-child
    margin-top: 30px
    border-top: 1px solid $color-light-grey

components.name: HomeComponent
MenuComponent

styleUrlsData.data:
@import '../styles/variables'

$search-color: $color-two

.brand-area
  padding: 13.5px 15px

.search
  height: 40px
  line-height: 14px
  font-size: 14px
  padding: 13.5px 15px
  width: 100%
  border-radius: 0
  color: $search-color
  outline: none
  border: none
  border-top: $color-light-grey 1px solid
  border-bottom: $color-light-grey 1px solid

  &.no-result
    border-color: $color-five
    color: $color-five

.search-helper
  width: 100%
  padding: 0 15px
  line-height: 20px
  height: 20px
  background-color: $search-color
  color: white
  font-size: 1rem
  transition: opacity 0.2s
  opacity: 1

  &.no-result
    background-color: $color-five

  &.hidden
    opacity: 0

\:host
  display: flex
  height: 100%
  overflow: hidden
  flex-direction: column

.links
  flex: 1 1
  overflow: auto

.extra-links, .header
  flex: 0 0 auto

components.templateData:
• Get started
{{(pages$ | async).length}} resultsresult found
  • {{page.title}}
No result for this search!

components.name: TabsComponent

styleUrlsData.data:
@import '../../styles/variables'

\:host
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column
  height: 300px
  overflow: hidden
  border: $color-light-grey 1px solid

ol
  margin: 0
  padding: 0

li
  list-style: none
  display: inline-block
  cursor: pointer
  padding: 0
  margin: 0

.content
  flex: 1 1
  overflow: auto

// implemented to display code
\:host
  margin-top: 20px

  .content
    background-color: whitesmoke
  pre
    margin-top: 0
  li
    padding: 0 15px
    line-height: 40px
    height: 40px
    border-bottom: 2px solid transparent
    transition: border-bottom 0.2s

    &:hover:not(.active)
      border-bottom-color: $color-light-grey
      
    &.active
      color: $color-four
      border-bottom-color: $color-four

components.templateData: 1. {{tab.label}}
